////							 		PUBLISHERS 									  	  ////
// Parameters:                                                                              //
//                                                                         					//
// [ID]int 					= The ID of the object.                                   		//
// [NAME (LANG)]string 		= The name of the publisher in the respective language.   		//
// [DATE](MONTH) (YEAR) 	= The date when the publisher is available.     				//
// [DATE END](MONTH) (YEAR) = The date on which the publisher will close.     				//
// [PIC]int					= The number of the logo in '/CompanyLogos' that will be used.  //
// [DEVELOPER]bool			= Does this publisher develop games?       						//
// [PUBLISHER]bool			= Does this publisher publish games by themselves and others?   //
// [MARKET]int				= The experience of the studio.                                 //
// [SHARE]int				= The payment you get from the publisher.                       //
// [GENRE](ID)				= The main genre that uses AI. 30% of the games get this genre. //
// [ONLYMOBILE]bool			= The publisher only releases mobile games.                     //
// [PLATFORM]bool			= If the publisher has a platform on the market,                //
//							  he releases his games there.                                  //
// [EXCLUSIVE]bool			= The publisher only releases games on its platform.            //
// [SPEED]int				= Development speed.                                            //
//							  The higher the value, the faster the development.             //
// [COMVAL]int				= The value of the publisher without additional changes.        //
// [NOTFORSALE]bool			= This publisher is not for sale.                               //
// [COUNTRY](ID)			= The home country of the publisher.                            //
//							  The countries can be viewed in the Country_(LANG).txt.        //
//							  The line corresponds to the ID.                               //
//                                                                                    		//
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

[ID]0
